thread.title: Here's Everything Coming To Netflix In April
thread.title_full: Here's Everything Coming To Netflix In April

author: Hunter Miller
title: Here's Everything Coming To Netflix In April
text:
Here's Everything Coming To Netflix In April Hunter Miller Back to Article Image of 
The new list of movies and TV shows being added to Netflix in April has dropped and it is time to get excited. The streaming service is adding a slew of classic titles that will have you binge watching like crazy. 
The new offerings on Netflix include a slew of original content options as well as a bevy of classic movies and shows. Some of the notable titles include Schindler's List , A Nightmare On Elm Street , The Prestige , and the hilarious Robert Downey Jr. flick Tropic Thunder . 
Check out the full list of titles coming to Netflix in April below: 
Avail. 4/1/17 
A Weekend with the Family (2016) 
A Nightmare on Elm Street (1984) 
Across the Universe (2007) 
An American Tail: Fievel Goes West 
(1991) 
An American Tail: The Mystery of the Night Monster (1999) 
Boy Bye (2016) 
Born To Be Free (2016) 
Cool Runnings (1993) 
Good Witch: Season 2 (2016) 
Gremlins (1984) 
Only for One Night (2016) 
Richard Pryor: Live & Smokin' (1971)
